Trusted_Role.description: Users who can set up the axethrow game.

Start_Game_Length.description: How long the game should last, not including timer increases. (seconds)

Load_Cache.description: Loads the setup from the plugin's cache, useful for persisting the setup logic between sessions.

Poll_Rate.description: The rate in miliseconds at which the plugin querys projectile data. The lower the value, the more accurate. (Setting this too low will cause lag)

Reset_Leaderboard.description: (Dangerous!) Clears the leaderboard upon start up.

commands.name: axethrow_top
commands.description: Prints the top 5 players with the highest scores

commands.name: axethrow_setup
commands.description: starts the axe throw setup procedure.
